name: ThePowerHouse GmbH
goal:
ThePowerHouse is a leading innovation agency for FashionTech, WearableTechnologies, Internet of Things (IoT), Industry 4.0 and SmartTextiles Manufacturing.
We have extensive knowledge and experience working with clients and partners to prototype and manufacture cutting-edge fashion and wearable technologies. From ideation, concepts, scouting markets and materials – to launching new products with feasibility studies to manufacturing solutions – we’re here to help.
We also offer internal innovation workshops to explore how your company can diversify its product range for new markets.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Culture, Development, Education, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
COSME Call FashionTech Network
Call Industry 2030
FashionTech New Education
IOT new DIN standards
